value.stringValue: Cana Rock - Notificación Cuotas en Atraso

constants.description: to add line breaks in emails
constants.name: conGCES

decisions.name: IS_THIS_MOST_RECENT_OVERDUE_CASH
decisions.label: IS THIS MOST RECENT OVERDUE CASH?

Flow.description: updated Email template design updated various fields updated flow
Flow.label: Cash: Send late payment notification

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Estimado(a):

{!Get_Contact.Name}

{!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.Tipo_de_pago__c}

{!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.Unidad__c}

FECHA:

{!$Flow.CurrentDate}



   Nos gustaría recordarle que tiene un pago pendiente que vence próximamente.



 
FECHA CONCEPTO MONTO MORA SUBTOTAL ABONO BALANCE
{!DateSummary} {!conGCES} {!DescriptionSummary} {!conGCES} {!MontoSummary} {!conGCES} {!MoraSummary} {!conGCES} {!SubtotalSummary} {!conGCES} {!AbonoSummary} {!conGCES} {!BalanceSummary} {!conGCES}


PENDIENTE DE PAGO
{!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}${!PendienteDePago}







Por favor, proceda a efectuar su pago con prontitud para evitar la acumulación de cargos adicionales.


En el caso de que ya haya cumplido con dicho compromiso, le rogamos que desestime la presente comunicación.


Si surge alguna pregunta o inquietud, no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros a través del siguiente correo electrónico: cuentasporcobrar@canarock.info.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Dear:

{!Get_Contact.Name}

{!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.Tipo_de_pago__c}

{!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.Unidad__c}

FECHA:

{!$Flow.CurrentDate}



   The purpose of this notice is to inform you of overdue fees, which are detailed below.



 
Expiration Concept Amount Overdue Fee Subtotal Payment Balance
{!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.pba_financial__Date__c} {!Get_Contact.Description} {!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.pba_financial__Amount__c} {!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.Late_Payment_Fee__c} {!Subtotal} {!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.pba_financial__Allocated__c} {!Get_Most_Recent_Overdue_Cash.pba_financial__Not_Allocated__c}









Outstanding Payment
{!NotAllocated}







Please proceed with your payment promptly to avoid accruing additional charges.


If you have already fulfilled this commitment, we ask that you please ignore this communication.


If you wish to contact us, we will be happy to assist you. You can send us an Email: cuentasporcobrar@canarock.info or Call us at: +1 (829) 748-6617.
